roleset.name: bother, cause stress in
roleset.note: BUG-V NOTES: Frames file for 'bug' based on sentences in ectb and ebc. (from bug.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: all arguments
example.text: I was one of the ones bugging Marian about [*] staying in her class .

roleset.name: gain information via a planted electronic recording device
roleset.note: BUG-V NOTES: Frame file eited by Arrick (from bug.02-v)

role.descr: person or institution planting the device

example.name: arg 1
example.text: Now that struck everybody in Washington as totally foolish Because for the last fifty years [every singe embassy in this town]-1 is bugged *-1
